programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Chuck works at a large courier company, and is in love with his girlfriend, Kelly. He plans to propose to her on Christmas, but is required to go to Malaysia for an urgent work assignment. The plane he's on crashes on the way, leaving Chuck as the only survivor on a deserted island, where it is up to him to protect both his own body and his own mind, by holding on to dreams of getting back.(n)

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: Napoleon Dynamite is a socially awkward teenager who lives with his grandma and unemployed older brother in Preston, Idaho. He sets out to help his friend, Pedro, win the class presidency while dealing with his insane family at home.(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A step-father finds himself threatened by fierce competition when his step-children's father, who is way more cool than him, shows up suddenly.(n)

programme.title: Henry's Crime
programme.desc: An innocent highway tollbooth worker is convicted of a bank heist, and decides to take the fall for a crime he did not do. While in jail, his formerly pathless life is altered when he meets his cellmate Max, a con man with whom he plans to rob a bank upon his release.(n)

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Shy student Todd Anderson attends the school where his older brother was famous along with his roommate Neil Perry. They meet John Keating, the new English teacher who creates a club called The Dead Poets Society,through which he tries to help his students restore balance in their lives.(n)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An MIT professor discovers the mathematical genius of the school's janitor who is being sued for assaulting a police officer. He arranges for the janitor, Will, to forgo jail time if he agrees to undergo therapy and study mathematics under his tutelage.(n)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Starting from a poor LA neighborhood, four friends find solace in their music as they use it to work through the various injustices they face day in and day out. As their brash lyrics attract controversy, their melodies and their authenticity soon transform the hip hop scene.(n)

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
programme.desc: After his mother was killed (Curtis '50 Cent' Jackson) was forced to leave school . He meets Majestic, and works with him in the drug business, but he later goes to jail. After leaving prison, he decides to mend his life and pursue his childhood dream of becoming a famous rapper.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Wonderful
programme.desc: The electrician Gus dreams of having his own bowling-alley, but he can't pay the down payment because of the alimony payments he makes to his ex-wife Leonora. He decides to find potential suitors for her, so that she can get married and he stops paying alimony.(n)

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Ferris pretends to be sick so he doesn't go to school, and he persuades his girlfriend Sloane and his friend Cameron to go to Chicago to spend time there to help him heal. The triple go with the car of Cameron's father, and events take a comic turn.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: The film revolves around the arrival of seven armed men, from the Old West to a remote village, in order to help its people, in their fight against an evil gang trying take advantage of the village and the people.(n)

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: The film follows the huge success painter Margaret Keane had in the 1950s, and her heated divorce from her husband Walter Keane, who fraudulently claimed credit for her works.(n)

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.(n)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Inspired by his ex-wife's memoirs, events revolve around the stunning story of the life and achievements of the inspiring physicist Stephen Hawking, despite his motor neurone disease, with a special focus on his relationship with his ex-wife, Jane Wilde.(n)

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: A group of men who work at a tower discover that they are victims of a wealthy businessman, and that they are part of a plan to steal the tower.(n)

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: An immigration officer finds herself in a tight spot as the fate of an asylum seeker lies in her hand, while flashbacks of his journey out of his homeland are portrayed.(n)

programme.title: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.(n)

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: A barbershop in Chicago is a place where plenty of interesting situations happen between the customers and the hairdressers at the barbershop, where each have their own dreams that they strive to reach in many different ways.(n)

programme.title: The Whole Truth
programme.desc: When a case turns personal for a defense attorney, he has to do everything in his power to save the only son of his widowed friend, Mike, who is accused of killing his rich father. But the trial reveals a lot of dark and hidden secrets about the victim, his wife, and their familial relationships.(n)

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: As an alien tasked with annihilating the human race arrives on Earth, he impersonates a doctor from a small town in Colorado, whereupon he becomes conflicted about his mission. Moreover, he discovers that a young boy can see his real extraterrestrial identity.(n)

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: A daily show hosted by Jimmy Falon, with a variety of numbers like comedy sketches, guest stars and music performance.(n)

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.(n)

programme.title: Love Locks
programme.desc: In the City of Light, Lindsey fell in love with Jack while studying at the Sorbonne, a romance that quickly ended when she went back to the US. Twenty years later, Lindsey returns to Paris with her daughter, only to run into Jack who quickly catches feelings for her all over again.(n)

programme.title: Fit for a Prince
programme.desc: After being hired by an opulent family to design the ladies' attire for a forthcoming charity event that the family is organizing, Cindy ends up meeting a prince who falls for her.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.(n)

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Set after the Avengers' Civil War but before the war with Thanos, Natasha Romanoff goes on a new mission in Russia, which stirs up her past with the KGB, her training by the Red Room, and her journey to becoming the hero known as the Black Widow.(n)

programme.title: Emma.
programme.desc: Emma Woodhouse is a young, wealthy woman who seeks a reprieve from her stilted small-town life by playing matchmaker for her friends and relatives, an endeavor that sees her meddling in the lives of those closest to her, often without being asked to.(n)

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942 during World War II, Canadian intelligence officer, Max Vatan, is partnered with French Resistance fighter, Marianne Beausejour, in an assasination mission in Casablanca. They fall in love and get married in London after which Max is confronted with an allegation from his superiors that Marianne is a German spy and if proved to be true, Max must execute her. Defying the set plan, Max decides to find out the truth about his wife on his own and endangers his life and those who try to help him in the process.(n)

programme.title: Love Struck Café
programme.desc: When she returns to her hometown for a business opportunity that involves a complicated confrontation with a childhood friend, Megan gets more than she reckoned for when her father breaks his leg and she starts helping at his cafe. Then an old flame shows up and everything spins out of control.(n)

programme.desc: When their newest job lands them in trouble with a local crime lord, two car thieves find that their only way out of their predicament is for them to agree to steal the prized car of the crime lord's rival.(n)

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: A DEA agent (Denzel Washington) and a naval intelligence officer (Mark Wahlberg) find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico

programme.desc: After mistakenly killing mafia criminals, two Irish brothers become vigilantes and consider themselves on a mission from God. As they start taking down mafia gang members, a detective tries to uncover who's behind those killings.(n)

programme.title: Pyewacket
programme.desc: A thriller about a frustrated daughter who chooses to perform a supernatural ritual to get rid of her mother because of their strained relationship together. But her ritual evokes an evil presence that unleashes its occult destruction.(n)

programme.title: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: As the last of the Air Nomads, Aang, who is also an Avatar who can master the art of bending all elements, embarks on a journey to master Waterbending with the help of siblings Sokka and Katara. On their tail comes the Fire Nation who wage war on the Earth Kingdom and the Water Tribes.(n)

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In the future, old age stops at 25 and everyone must provide more time for themselves for a longer life. Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.(n)

programme.title: The Internship
programme.desc: Billy and Nick are two old school salesmen who embark into a daring challenge, when they start an internship at Google, as they struggle to beat tech-savvy geniuses for a shot to be hired.(n)

programme.title: The Fountain
programme.desc: Across three eras, three different men share one goal: to find the tree of life that could grant them eternity with the women they love. Despite their different backgrounds and different times, they are all beset by their fight against human frailty and mortality, fighting to preserve their love.(n)

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: When Joy Ellis and Jack Fuller meet by accident in Las Vegas, they end up getting married after a night of partying. After they agree to get divorced, they win a three million dollar jackpot, and they're forced to stay married so they could split the money.(n)

programme.title: Battle for Incheon: Operation Chromite
